title: Arrays & Basic Searching
concept: This level introduces Data Structures & Algorithms using basic arrays, traversal, summation, max/min search, counting occurrence, and linear search without using inbuilt functions.

challenges.title: Sum of Array
challenges.description: Read N and N integers. Print the total sum.

challenges.title: Maximum Element
challenges.description: Print the largest element in the array.

challenges.title: Minimum Element
challenges.description: Print the smallest element in the array.

challenges.title: Linear Search
challenges.description: Search for X in the array. Print Yes if found else No.

challenges.title: Count Occurrences
challenges.description: Print how many times X occurs in the array.

challenges.title: Reverse Array Print
challenges.description: Print array in reverse order separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Second Largest
challenges.description: Find the second largest DISTINCT element in the array.

challenges.title: Sorted or Not
challenges.description: Check if array is sorted in non-decreasing order. Print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Prefix Sum Array
challenges.description: Create prefix sum array where prefix[i] = sum of elements from index 0 to i. Print prefix array.
